19cc4e42-39bb-41f9-b9de-9f2940eed6a2.overall_goal: Clean inside the car using a mop and manage cleaning tools (cloth and mop-stick) by storing and retrieving them across locations.

episodes.name: Mop and Sweep
episodes.description: The person picks up a mop-stick and sweeps the floor inside the car, then closes the door and places the mop-stick on the floor.

fbf4150a-27d2-48a4-956f-b4f85ecde465.overall_goal: Set up, power, and use a laptop workstation with its peripherals (charger, keyboard, mouse) to operate the laptop.

episodes.name: Laptop setup and use
episodes.description: The person interacts with the laptop and peripherals: typing/pressing keys, closing and putting the laptop away, then picking it up again, connecting power, placing the keyboard and mouse, and using them.

954c2f61-64ad-4c89-a26f-ec4547a65fab.overall_goal: Prepare an onion and cook it by washing, prepping (slicing/peeling), placing it into a pot, filling the pot with water, and turning on the cooker.

episodes.name: Onion Prep and Cook
episodes.description: The person washes and prepares an onion (holding, slicing, peeling), handles a pot (places it under the tap, fills it with water, places it on the cooker), and turns on the cooker to begin cooking.

277b18de-4ad9-4c09-970b-91fcea05097d.overall_goal: Perform wheel maintenance: organize and store tools, operate tools to tighten/adjust bolts and nuts, and remove the wheel.

episodes.name: Select Tools
episodes.description: The person picks up and places individual tools (wrench, plier, spanner) presumably preparing/selecting them.

e9be1118-a5cf-4431-b2e8-e3edcfa9f949.overall_goal: Assemble and fasten wood components by positioning parts, clamping, drilling holes, and installing screws.

episodes.name: Position, Clamp, Drill
episodes.description: The person picks up tools and parts, positions and secures clamps, drills holes in the wood pieces, and temporarily puts down or releases tools and parts during the assembly process.

episodes.name: Final Screw Placement
episodes.description: The person picks up the screwdriver and screw and positions the screw on the wood-piece in preparation for final fastening.

f5c27b88-a3eb-4290-9102-0307c2809241.overall_goal: Organize and clean books on the bookshelf

episodes.name: Arrange & place books
episodes.description: The person arranges books and places them on different surfaces, aligning them on the bookshelf.

97ad4e58-c64f-47e3-8d84-6aad38bdfbc8.overall_goal: Install and secure bolts on the machine using hand tools (hammer and screwdriver).

episodes.name: Initial placement & tightening
episodes.description: The person picks up a hammer and uses it while holding the machine, then picks and positions a bolt and tightens it using a screwdriver.

episodes.name: Repeat positioning & tightening
episodes.description: The person places the screwdriver, then repeatedly picks up and positions a bolt on the machine and tightens it with the screwdriver.

a20c2c22-cc2c-487e-8041-f0b33f4845ca.overall_goal: Attach and finish a piece of fabric onto furniture (cut, glue, fasten, and trim)

episodes.name: Cutting Fabric
episodes.description: The person picks up scissors, holds and cuts the fabric, then puts the scissors down and releases the fabric.

860980fb-f992-4bb1-8a46-b644f58090e2.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble paper and cardboard components, then apply glue to attach and secure the cardboard onto the paper.

episodes.name: Position metal board
episodes.description: The person picks up a metal board and places and adjusts it on top of the paper.

15d4a2c1-1cb8-4b76-a66a-adb20b7e96cb.overall_goal: Inspect and manipulate a card on the table

episodes.name: Card inspection cycle
episodes.description: The person repeatedly touches and taps a card on the table, then picks it up to check it and puts it back down, using their right hand (hand1).

5533ab65-7463-47a6-b040-c0c6d65b8cf5.overall_goal: Assemble and secure parts of a motorcycle wheel and related components (fold tag, adjust wheel/tyre, attach pipe, and fasten nuts/bolts).

episodes.name: Fold Tags
episodes.description: The person folds tags using both hands.

5293587a-e6c4-4760-8277-cf284588aac3.overall_goal: Wash, dry, and store dishes and utensils

episodes.name: Prepare workspace
episodes.description: Person readies the cleaning area by placing the sponge and manipulating the tap before washing.

ab5f1a57-29b3-4c07-bc82-bed0b1c3d42f.overall_goal: Clean and dry dishes (mug and bowl) and return them to the table

episodes.name: Wash Bowl
episodes.description: The person opens the tap, holds the bowl, washes and rinses it, then closes the tap.

d4fc1fd7-c725-454e-9d2b-0fbc774e81d6.overall_goal: Install and secure a bolt on the engine, apply adhesive, clean up, and then pick up a ring and move toward a machine.

episodes.name: Bolt Installation Sequence
episodes.description: The person picks up tools and parts, places and holds a bolt on the engine, tightens it with a wrench, cleans and applies glue with a brush, then picks up a ring and moves toward a machine.

efa59c4e-71de-4184-9c82-f78efd4d4702.overall_goal: Assemble a bicycle by attaching pedals, installing brakes and cables, positioning the frame, and mounting the wheels.

episodes.name: Install pedal
episodes.description: The person picks up a pedal, attaches it to the bicycle frame and tightens the bolt using a wrench, then releases and puts the wrench down.

a5a0a366-8721-413f-8412-66cf69b23b18.overall_goal: Clean used dishes and utensils and return them to storage

episodes.name: Store cloth
episodes.description: The person opens a cupboard, places a cloth into it, and closes the cupboard.

2ae97f2a-b16d-467b-b73a-721cb00996f1.overall_goal: Prepare, shape, and arrange dough pieces in a pan, then brush them with oil for baking.

episodes.name: Mix ingredients
episodes.description: The person picks up a spatula, mixes the bowl contents, then puts the spatula down.

3ea57fa2-fd76-48c1-923e-e90b14373c7e.overall_goal: Prepare and shape dough (mix ingredients, knead, roll into a pan, and cut portions).

episodes.name: Gather & Add Ingredients
episodes.description: The person picks up flour, sugar, and a bottle, carries and pours these ingredients into the mixer, and places the containers on the table.

203ee455-6f60-4e08-bd89-28e2ca3927da.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble a dough mixture and place shaped dough on a tray, while preheating the oven

episodes.name: Preheat Oven
episodes.description: The person opens the oven, places a tray inside, closes it, and sets the timer.

8be918b2-c819-4a84-98dc-5fe24835a4ac.overall_goal: Paint a door frame while preparing and protecting the work area and managing the paint can and tools.

episodes.name: Initial Painting
episodes.description: The person dips the brush in paint, holds the door/frame, paints the door-frame, and then releases the door.

44ae604b-2e16-497d-a018-03495d8d5654.overall_goal: Clean and service the car by rinsing, washing (including the windshield), drying, manipulating the wipers, and refilling cleaning supplies.

episodes.name: Gather supplies
episodes.description: The person picks up and places the bucket, handles the water hose, and sets down the sponge preparing equipment.

a0d6bd8e-c477-442b-bab3-731775b44b43.overall_goal: Person washes a car, preparing supplies (towel, bucket, hose), wetting the car, and scrubbing it clean.

episodes.name: Prepare & Wet
episodes.description: The person gathers and readies cleaning supplies, fills a bucket from the tap, sprays the car with a hose and places items for washing.

episodes.name: Scrub & Finish
episodes.description: The person raises the wiper, uses the sponge to wash and move across the car surface (flipping and dipping the sponge as needed), then lowers the wiper to finish.

3c80ddb5-5046-4d97-9162-5e5a87ccb2fd.overall_goal: Use tools from the toolbox and cabinet to remove and re-tighten a bolt on the car while managing and storing tools.

episodes.name: Retrieve Wrench
episodes.description: The person opens the toolbox and picks up a wrench from it.

episodes.name: Reposition & Gather
episodes.description: The person repositions the toolbox to the car/workbench area, opens the cabinet, and takes out additional tools (wrench, screwdriver).

episodes.name: Store Tools & Service Bolt
episodes.description: The person places tools into the toolbox and cabinet, closes them, then uses the wrench to loosen, remove, and later re-tighten the bolt on the car, placing and retrieving the bolt as needed.

05c937ff-816b-46b8-8ae2-864eae85e987.overall_goal: Prepare and finish a stand by inspecting, sanding it with sandpaper, and placing it on the table.

episodes.name: Inspect and Sand Stand
episodes.description: The person handles and orients the stand, inspects it, picks up sandpaper, smoothens the stand using the sandpaper, then places items on the table and makes final adjustments.

4f68183f-610a-44de-b102-e7f300b49dcd.overall_goal: Prepare and mix dough by combining ingredients, kneading, and adding water

episodes.name: Bowl setup & mix
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth, covers the bowl, and mixes initial ingredients in the bowl.

3c18ec5c-7e6b-400d-9260-70598e04a373.overall_goal: Potting a plant: placing a plant into a pot, adding and adjusting soil, and tidying up tools and materials.

episodes.name: Prepare pot & plant
episodes.description: The person picks up the pot, sets it on the table, picks up the plant, places it into the pot and adjusts its position.

d851b431-8551-492b-8332-bd46c3bfdaba.overall_goal: Pot the plant by adding soil into a planter and positioning the plant using a trowel and hands.

episodes.name: Planting and Filling
episodes.description: The person places and adjusts the plant in the planter, then repeatedly uses a trowel to scoop soil from a bag and pour it into the planter, finishing by putting the trowel down and releasing the bag.

episodes.name: Refill and Finish
episodes.description: The person puts the trowel down, picks it up again, dips and scoops more soil from the bag, then releases the bag and holds the planter to finish.

dabf199a-bf55-440d-8aeb-77ead18097ae.overall_goal: Attach fabric to the door and assemble/secure fasteners (bolts and nuts) using hand tools

episodes.name: Attach fabric
episodes.description: The person picks up the fabric and attaches it to the door using both hands.

1560b9ee-e2da-4dda-a875-52e5bae8d88a.overall_goal: Remove a wire from a plug by loosening retaining nuts with a screwdriver and then pulling the wire out.

episodes.name: Disconnect Wire
episodes.description: The person picks up the plug and tools, loosens nuts with a screwdriver, manipulates the wire and plug, and finally pulls the wire out.

5bc29170-aa13-4dd7-bb48-2790f676463c.overall_goal: Repair and restore an electrical connection by cutting/inspecting the cable, testing it, rejoining and securing the connection, then restoring power.

episodes.name: Remove and cut wire
episodes.description: The person picks up a wire from the wall, handles it briefly, then grabs a knife and cuts the wire before putting the knife down.

c4d332b2-7fcc-4993-b9ea-26d6f794984f.overall_goal: Collect leaves from plants using pruning shears and place them into a basket

episodes.name: Prepare Basket
episodes.description: The person picks up and carries the basket, then places it on the ground to prepare for harvesting.

df0fa70d-600e-477b-aaea-275f86ff7010.overall_goal: Attach, adjust, and verify a gauge on a wheel/motorcycle assembly

episodes.name: Gauge Preparation
episodes.description: The person prepares and adjusts the gauge: they pick up tools and parts, tighten and insert screws into the gauge, clean and check the gauge, and handle small tools and fasteners.

episodes.name: Mounting on Wheel
episodes.description: The person mounts and secures the gauge to the wheel and motorcycle: they pick up a wrench and hammer, fix and tighten the gauge onto the wheel, clean and adjust the wheel and motorcycle, and perform final checks.

32e25924-9d92-4030-a328-11e2c4c7ac56.overall_goal: Prepare, season, and bake shaped dough on a tray

episodes.name: Shape dough
episodes.description: The person picks up and handles dough  transferring, dipping, twisting, shaping and rolling it, repeatedly placing it on the table while forming bread-like pieces.

c1ef9d03-1278-4216-b1e4-b1a298a892d9.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble dough strips onto a tray (scrape and cut dough, then place strips on a tray)

episodes.name: Approach Table
episodes.description: The person moves to the table to begin the task.

episodes.name: Prepare and Load Strips
episodes.description: The person picks up a scraper to scrape dough from the table, cuts the dough into strips, and transports the resulting dough strips to a tray (with intermediary placing of a tray on a rack).

950f70a4-f90b-4a15-97a0-c14ad6960285.overall_goal: Clean and put away dirty kitchenware (wash, dry, sanitize sink/counter, and store dishes).

episodes.name: Wash Sieve
episodes.description: The person cleans the sieve by washing, rinsing under the tap, and drying it with a towel, then puts items down.

583ff0cb-4697-4f63-b525-bf5bc2318117.overall_goal: Prepare and bake dough (making bread), then handle and process the baked goods and dough using kitchen equipment.

episodes.name: Prepare Dough
episodes.description: The person measures and adds flour, sprinkles it onto the dough, places the flour down, and kneads the dough to mix ingredients.

f35817ce-c97c-4795-b92d-bfd71aa3c7de.overall_goal: Assemble and secure parts (bolts and cover) onto a motorbike using a screwdriver.

episodes.name: Install First Bolt
episodes.description: The person moves the motorbike, picks up a bolt and a screwdriver, holds the bike, and tightens the bolt onto the motorbike before putting the screwdriver down and releasing the bike.

fefb0892-7e1a-4a34-9418-ea1c96705edc.overall_goal: Prepare and maintain a potted plant by cleaning the pot, grooming and arranging the plant, adding fertilizer and water, then trimming leaves.

episodes.name: Plant care routine
episodes.description: The person cleans the pot, grooms and positions the plant, inspects it, applies fertilizer and water, and finishes by trimming leaves and putting tools down.

56ddd3b9-5598-4f87-8a90-3f7c810d3e74.overall_goal: Remove a motorbike wheel, perform maintenance (unscrew/replace/tighten bolts), reattach the wheel, and verify alignment/rotation.

episodes.name: Loosen Fasteners
episodes.description: The person gathers tools and loosens/removes bolts and screws from the wheel, using several tools and tapping to free stuck parts, then places tools aside.

c9a6233c-7a8b-488c-b0ab-bce963c643bd.overall_goal: Assemble and secure a chair by inserting and tightening screws and bolts using hand tools.

episodes.name: Approach & Prepare
episodes.description: The person moves to the work area, picks up tools and braces a joint, taps it with a hammer, then puts the hammer down and releases the joint.

a61ec2b9-bc21-4e55-ac3f-9f52407633cc.overall_goal: Prepare and shape dough, combine it with flour and water, then bake it in the oven.

episodes.name: Cut Dough
episodes.description: The person picks up a scrapper, holds and cuts the dough, then puts the scrapper down.

episodes.name: Shape, Mix & Bake
episodes.description: The person releases and shapes the dough (rolling/stretching), adds flour and water, mixes ingredients, places dough into a pan and puts it into the oven, then sets the timer.

a1f09ebf-619d-41fd-841d-56629d803003.overall_goal: Clean and tidy the area by collecting debris, scraping wood surfaces, and sweeping the floor.

episodes.name: Full cleanup sequence
episodes.description: The person gathers and places various items, dons gloves, scrapes and scrubs wood and floor surfaces, then sweeps and collects dust into a dustpan before putting tools down.

26b635ab-134a-477c-a22e-e805eed07a9d.overall_goal: Clean dishes and utensils (scrub, rinse, and place them on the drying rack)

episodes.name: Prepare cleaning
episodes.description: Person puts on a glove, readies a sponge and soap, wets the sponge at the tap, then sets soap and sponge down.

8cf5a53b-fa9c-4fe7-b767-697133d4d5b8.overall_goal: Prepare painting materials, paint a book, then clean and dry the paintbrush.

episodes.name: Prepare workspace
episodes.description: The person picks up and places the canvas on an easel and picks up the paintbrush and palette to prepare for painting.

4988de48-c77e-406d-8367-68fe2266a8aa.overall_goal: Carve, refine, and finish a wood sculpture using a chisel and hand tools

episodes.name: Initial Carving
episodes.description: The person picks up the chisel, carves the raw wood, inspects the carved area, and places the chisel on the workbench.

episodes.name: Sculpting Iteration
episodes.description: The person adjusts machine components, repeatedly picks up and uses the chisel to work on the sculpture (shaving and wiping dust), inspects the sculpture, and places the chisel back on the workbench between uses.

episodes.name: Clamp, Measure, Finish
episodes.description: The person secures the work (adjusts and turns clamps), holds and places the wood, measures and marks it, performs final carving and smoothing, and brushes off dust to finish the surface.

aa8fcce0-75d1-485f-aede-5d9e6997ad41.overall_goal: Prepare and clean the car interior by removing trash and items, unlocking and opening the car, cleaning the seat, placing a mat, and using a cloth and bottle to apply liquid.

episodes.name: Clean & Prepare Car
episodes.description: The person removes items and trash, unlocks and opens the car, cleans the seat with a cloth, places a mat into the car, retrieves items from a bag, and pours liquid onto a cloth.

6cfe67ef-f0cc-47f0-8808-31efcf876095.overall_goal: Assemble and secure a furniture piece by inserting and tightening screws, inspect alignment and stability, and then store tools.

episodes.name: Gather & Position
episodes.description: The person picks up the screwdriver and screws from the bowl and positions screws onto the furniture piece in preparation for insertion.

41b8254c-ca1e-464c-9323-55301fb5f0e8.overall_goal: Prepare a beverage by retrieving ingredients, adding ice and sugar, pouring liquid into a cup, and stirring.

episodes.name: Collect & Prep
episodes.description: The person gathers drink components (bottle, cup, spoon, ice), rinses and readies the spoon, removes ice from a tray and adds ice to the cup, and stirs the drink.

episodes.name: Pour & Sweeten
episodes.description: The person retrieves a bottle and jar from the counter, opens them, pours liquid into the cup, scoops and adds sugar, and places items back on the counter.

d04f8465-d11f-40d1-8315-302380ec0af4.overall_goal: Modify a pen by preparing and trimming its cover and then cutting the pen with a cutter.

episodes.name: Prepare and Cut Cover
episodes.description: The person picks up a cutter and a cover, uses the cutter to cut the cover, then puts the cutter down.

577f3941-c9f6-45d3-893e-3fd12cffcad1.overall_goal: Safely remove a rope from a plant and store it, then clean up.

episodes.name: Inspect and Prepare
episodes.description: The person inspects the plant, clears debris, re-checks, and brings the plant into position for work.

352f1eea-606d-4cd7-906f-733affaf6823.overall_goal: Dismantle a fence board by removing fasteners, inspect and collect tools, store the tools, and untie a rope.

episodes.name: Remove board
episodes.description: The person lifts, carries, and places a fence board onto the ground.

5ec85bbd-e6c4-46e3-8da5-28576730b35f.overall_goal: Set the dining table and gather tableware onto a tray

episodes.name: Set table and gather
episodes.description: The person arranges and adjusts tableware on the dining table, brings and positions a tray, inspects the arrangement, then repeatedly picks up cups and plates and places them onto the tray while moving the tray between locations.

e8e54409-495b-49e5-b325-556c812d6ff4.overall_goal: Wash, rinse, and dry clean dishes and utensils and place them on the rack.

episodes.name: Turn on water
episodes.description: The person turns on the tap to start the water flow.

f646012d-baca-46a6-bc03-32047c83f5dc.overall_goal: Clean the camera and manage its coverinstalling the cover (screwing it on) and later removing itusing a wipe and a screwdriver.

episodes.name: Clean & Install Cover
episodes.description: The person cleans the camera and installs the cover, using a wipe and a screwdriver and placing items on the table as needed.

episodes.name: Hold, Clean & Unscrew
episodes.description: The person holds and further cleans the camera, then picks up the screwdriver to unscrew (remove) the cover and puts tools down.

831a2da3-bf97-4a79-aa47-16bcdca9e3cd.overall_goal: Load laundry from the basket into the washing machine and add detergent.

episodes.name: Bring & Prepare
episodes.description: The person picks up the laundry basket, carries it to the washing machine, places it nearby, arranges clothes in the basket, and opens the machine door.

1db339f1-f887-4e46-86be-2df8eda596db.overall_goal: Use a bucket to fetch water from a tap and pour it into the car's reservoirs (top up washer/other containers).

episodes.name: Prepare bucket
episodes.description: Person picks up a bucket, walks to the tap, and places the bucket under the tap to prepare for filling.

303505b9-2cf3-488d-ae5f-d72d3bf73585.overall_goal: Assemble and decorate a cardboard component onto a model train using cutting, glue, cloth, and paint.

episodes.name: Cut and trim
episodes.description: The person picks up the cardboard, uses scissors to cut and trim excess material, and sets the scissors down.

92af2e29-8b4c-4a37-bb48-f3b3e4d1901a.overall_goal: Remove a car mat, clean it (spray/scrub/rinse/dry/vacuum), and put it back into the car

episodes.name: Remove mat
episodes.description: The person opens the car, takes the mat out and places it on the ground.

e03004cc-80ce-4d82-9d09-f50fc82b6456.overall_goal: Paint a piece of wood using prepared paint

episodes.name: Prepare workspace
episodes.description: The person picks up cardboard and a piece of wood and places them on the workbench to set up a painting surface.

e08c9103-d6a0-4a43-8276-c8f5e7cfe57f.overall_goal: Install and secure a grinding wheel on a bench grinder, start the grinder, and use the rotating wheel to file a chisel.

episodes.name: Install and Use Wheel
episodes.description: The person prepares the grinder (inserting key, mounting and tightening the wheel), starts the grinder, and files the chisel against the rotating wheel.

d84b8c76-d6b9-4e27-ae66-b010bce5ed1e.overall_goal: Prepare and press fabric: position and smooth fabric on an ironing board, use an iron to press it, then check, fold, and move the finished fabric to the table.

episodes.name: Position and Iron
episodes.description: The person adjusts and positions the fabric on the ironing board, picks up the iron, presses (irons) the fabric, and returns the iron to the board.

episodes.name: Check, Fold, Store
episodes.description: After returning the iron, the person releases and repositions the fabric, checks/feels it, folds it, and finally moves the folded fabric to the table.

1fdbef9f-8aa7-46b1-8063-d1435577608a.overall_goal: Prepare, fold and iron garments (shirt/short) using an iron and ironing board

episodes.name: Prepare garment
episodes.description: The person picks up and positions a garment on the ironing board, spreading and adjusting it for further processing.

e252c493-e587-403d-bd01-22713a1d5a57.overall_goal: Prepare and iron a shirt, store the iron, then fold the shirt.

episodes.name: Initial ironing
episodes.description: Pick up the iron and iron the shirt, adjust it on the board and turn the iron off.

ea87324e-d129-425f-b247-e6bcc4ff332c.overall_goal: Apply paint to a wooden workpiece and perform surface preparation and cleanup (sanding, wiping) including opening the paint can.

episodes.name: Apply paint
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush, dips it into the can, holds the wood and paints it, then puts the brush down and releases the wood.

7da432dc-690a-49da-8f44-312c84494c75.overall_goal: Paint a rail using a paintbrush, including refilling from a paint can as needed and then cleaning and storing the brush.

episodes.name: Apply paint to rail
episodes.description: The person repeatedly dips the brush in paint and applies paint along the rail, moving the brush along the rail between strokes.

e8cf9894-0cc7-4480-b490-885308bfb513.overall_goal: Prepare and bake shaped dough pieces by shaping and cutting the dough, applying an egg wash, and placing the tray into the oven to bake.

episodes.name: Shape Dough Pieces
episodes.description: The person picks up portions of dough, shapes each into dough-pieces, and places them onto a tray.

e43f5b38-213a-4d42-afaa-32c3b77f4da6.overall_goal: Prepare dough (assemble and top with sauce), season it, and bake it in the oven

episodes.name: Prepare dough & tray
episodes.description: The person picks up dough and a tray, places dough on the countertop and then onto the tray to assemble portions for topping.

c7cc9fbf-e47a-4bc7-9f08-7ff6954a787a.overall_goal: Prepare dough from flour and water and process it using a mixing/processing machine.

episodes.name: Gather & Setup
episodes.description: The person picks up and places the bag of flour, opens it, and readies the bowl for use.

3121a918-44a3-446a-b809-95e1b5766cb0.overall_goal: Clean, rinse, dry, and store kitchen dishes and utensils

episodes.name: Store Tray
episodes.description: The person picks up a tray, carries it to the cupboard, places it inside, and closes the cupboard.

312da1d0-9e56-4f5e-bb12-9cb67e8bc674.overall_goal: Set up and operate a generator-powered watering system to spray plants (prepare tank and connections, refuel the generator, then water the plants).

episodes.name: Start & Check
episodes.description: The person powers/activates the machine by pushing a button and checks the generator.

1f757b4c-032e-4012-a0f9-bb7c1a437612.overall_goal: Secure and fasten a hose by attaching and tightening a wire tie, using hands and pliers as needed.

episodes.name: Gather and Secure Hose
episodes.description: The person inspects and gathers the hose and wire, wraps and ties the wire around the hose, uses pliers to twist/tighten the wire, places tools/items on the workbench, then checks and finalizes the securement.

4fcddb9e-38ad-4948-acf6-dd76e87f7eb3.overall_goal: Install and adjust a bicycle wheel by preparing tools, attaching the wheel to the bike, cleaning and inspecting, and making final bolt adjustments

episodes.name: Use screwdriver
episodes.description: Person picks up a screwdriver, tightens screws on the bicycle wheel, then returns the screwdriver to the toolbox.

39865b55-0b68-4cf9-a9fa-d55cfbc5909b.overall_goal: Inspect and assemble engine components by installing a cover and securing fasteners (bolts, screws, nuts) using hand tools.

episodes.name: Cover Installation
episodes.description: The person inspects the engine, places a cover, and fastens it while checking and adjusting engine parts.

episodes.name: Final Tightening
episodes.description: The person removes a hand from a nut, then picks up tools to tighten additional screws/metal parts and puts the tools down.

4ad40842-5cee-49c2-a382-211fd7a4872b.overall_goal: Remove baked bread from the oven into a basket, clean up crumbs, return the tray to the oven, and arrange the bread on the table.

episodes.name: Prepare workspace
episodes.description: The person removes the tray from the oven and places it and a basket on the table to prepare for removing the bread.

72d27890-983d-48f8-8eed-7ca937424ca2.overall_goal: Remove a plant by securing it with a rope and pulling it from the ground, then coil and store the rope (and uproot a weed).

episodes.name: Tie, Pull, Store
episodes.description: The person ties a rope around a plant, tightens and pulls the plant out of the ground, places the plant on the ground, coils the rope and places it in a toolbox, then grips and uproots a weed.

a814274f-898a-4bc4-ad93-f764844bf03c.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble a piece of wood by cutting, measuring, marking, drilling, inserting and tightening a screw, then reposition the wood and remove tape.

episodes.name: Prepare and Fasten
episodes.description: The person prepares the wood (cutting, measuring, marking, drilling) and installs a screw, finishing by tightening it.

episodes.name: Reposition and Clean
episodes.description: The person repositions and places the wood on the workbench, releases/holds it with hands, then removes and puts down tape.

82dc7a9e-a0a4-4611-8e49-960d6c77b326.overall_goal: Prepare and finish a railing by painting, fastening, cleaning, wiping, and inspecting it

episodes.name: Paint Railing
episodes.description: The person picks up a paintbrush, dips it in paint, paints the railing several times, then puts the brush down.

7070897e-556f-421a-b662-551fe2ab7fb5.overall_goal: Prepare, close, and seal a container by cleaning it, placing the lid, and securing the lid with tape.

episodes.name: Close and Seal Container
episodes.description: The person cleans the container, places and secures the lid, then cuts and applies tape around the lid edge and smooths it down.

3619f6fe-9722-4e98-ac1a-372821f1ec78.overall_goal: Load and organize personal items into the car (trunk and interior compartments).

episodes.name: Load and stow items
episodes.description: The person opens compartments (trunk and glove-box), picks up multiple personal items and stows them into the trunk, glove-box, dashboard and other compartments, then closes the glove-box.

3db79f36-a611-42f6-bfb7-76cf7720a00a.overall_goal: Sew a piece of fabric by threading a needle, stitching the fabric, trimming excess thread and finishing the sewn area.

episodes.name: Thread and Stitch
episodes.description: The person picks up the needle and thread, sews the fabric while pulling and tightening the thread to form stitches.

39653b45-9792-4ef2-bc6b-945431870ce3.overall_goal: Knit fabric by preparing materials, forming stitches, trimming ends, and continuing knitting while checking tension.

episodes.name: Setup & Cast-on
episodes.description: The person picks up the yarn and knitting needle, inserts and wraps the yarn to create the initial loop and tighten it to start the first stitch.

0da6e15a-d33b-4a61-bfce-1fb28d893637.overall_goal: Create and adjust crochet stitches to work yarn into a fabric using a crochet hook and hands

episodes.name: Tool and Yarn Prep
episodes.description: The person picks up yarn and a crochet hook to prepare materials for crocheting.

f8442573-f48f-4f2b-9f22-b208f916aa63.overall_goal: Clean and clear the hose, then coil and hang it for storage.

episodes.name: Prepare and Clean
episodes.description: The person picks up a rag and uses it to clean the hose, then puts the rag away.

49374bc5-0999-49dc-88bd-c42c0d54365f.overall_goal: Clean and dry a car (wash off soap, wipe, rinse, and dry)

episodes.name: Car washing sequence
episodes.description: The person repeatedly picks up a rag and hose, wets and wrings the rag, wipes the car to remove spots and soap, sprays and rinses the car with a hose and bucket, inspects for missed spots, refills water as needed, and finally dries the car with a rag.

9f9f42f0-b9fc-4247-8dad-3ef0ff36e402.overall_goal: Prepare and treat a wood surface by cleaning, applying oil, sanding, and wiping it.

episodes.name: Surface preparation & treatment
episodes.description: The person sequentially picks up and uses tools (brush, leaf, oil, sandpaper, cloth) to clean the wood, apply oil, sand the surface, and finally wipe it, putting tools down between steps.

6f082d5d-5f31-4358-b2dc-16d320312ab3.overall_goal: Prepare and cook dough strips (roll, shape, cook, finish and tidy up)

episodes.name: Roll Dough
episodes.description: The person picks up and uses a rolling pin to roll out dough, then puts the rolling pin back on the table.

6287465a-ef00-49db-b730-1e1c22e77790.overall_goal: Clean the floor by sweeping and disposing collected dust

episodes.name: Handle tools
episodes.description: The person picks up and manipulates cleaning tools (broom and dustpan), occasionally placing them into storage or preparing the dustpan.

1695475c-e527-43e6-b70e-69fd33023148.overall_goal: Prepare and secure wiring and then connect a cable into a socket.

episodes.name: Wire preparation
episodes.description: The person picks up and uses various tools to handle wires and fasteners: passing and placing wires, tightening screws/bolts, wrapping connections with insulation tape, and cutting wires.

episodes.name: Cable insertion
episodes.description: The person picks up the cable and the socket (holding the socket) and inserts the cable into the socket to complete the connection.

d6de6eee-b844-49c9-81d4-325fb9697ef6.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble nut-filled cracker sandwiches and place them on a plate

episodes.name: Set up crackers
episodes.description: The person arranges crackers on a plate to prepare a workspace.

e435eea1-e4f7-4eef-970e-227152032a08.overall_goal: Prepare and clean a keg by filling and rinsing it, transporting and placing it, and finally handling and removing its lid

episodes.name: Keg preparation and handling
episodes.description: The person picks up a cup to fill and pour water into the keg, operates the faucet and hose to rinse the keg inside and outside, then moves the keg (placing it on a shelf and later at the faucet/ground), and finally picks up and removes the lid.

aa2975d0-9339-4ebf-8f3a-bbdf91bf82ed.overall_goal: Prepare a soil mixture in a container, inspect and seal it, then shake to mix.

episodes.name: Gather and mix
episodes.description: The person uses a trowel and hands to collect soil from a bucket, pour it into a container, and stir the mixture.

fdb68b7b-f09f-4a71-a85c-b02e728e9566.overall_goal: Work on a bicycle wheel and tire assembly: position the bicycle, install and secure a wheel and tire, then remove the wheel and strip the tire for repair or replacement.

episodes.name: Position Bicycle
episodes.description: The person picks up and moves the bicycle to the workbench and releases it for work.

19ed57bf-e23d-425b-a396-30daa1d5e750.overall_goal: Perform maintenance on a motorcycle and scooter: remove and replace a tyre, inspect and clean, and tighten/loosen/unscrew fasteners using hand tools.

episodes.name: Replace Tyre
episodes.description: The person removes a tyre from the motorcycle, places it aside, then fits a tyre back onto the motorcycle.

d4346ac0-ef62-405b-9086-4ee0085af9ab.overall_goal: Install ceiling holders using a screwdriver and a ladder, repositioning the ladder between installs.

episodes.name: Install holder #1
episodes.description: The person takes out a screwdriver and a holder, holds the holder against the ceiling, fixes it with the screwdriver, then releases it and pockets the screwdriver.

c9f5958f-ea3f-452e-913d-4f6ede7decea.overall_goal: Prune and manage vine growth by cutting and removing vines, tying plants, and disposing vine material.

episodes.name: Prune and Remove Vines
episodes.description: The person picks up tools and rope, cuts and pulls out vines and plant material, ties plants, and places cut vines into a bin or pack.

f643d88a-92cc-456d-bed7-c010275637e8.overall_goal: Tend the garden by removing weeds and grass, trimming vines, uprooting unwanted plants, and watering remaining plants.

episodes.name: Pull out weeds
episodes.description: The person pulls a weed, holds it briefly, and places it on the ground.

99158929-5e0b-4fa5-948c-9791c25cf0ac.overall_goal: Extract, arrange, and organize papers from a booklet and place them on the table.

episodes.name: Align papers
episodes.description: The person repeatedly picks up, adjusts, and places individual papers on the table to align or position them.

f0beca54-3ef3-4c5f-a3e3-c10478e624b5.overall_goal: Remove, service, and reattach a bicycle pedal using hand tools

episodes.name: Inspect & Position
episodes.description: The person tests and repositions the pedal near the bicycle using both hands.

episodes.name: Remove & Reinstall Pedal
episodes.description: The person picks up tools, loosens and removes the pedal and associated nut, then reattaches and tightens the pedal using spanner/pliers, placing tools down as needed.

1cddd647-6aaf-49ed-b09d-922d729453a8.overall_goal: Sort and arrange books by picking them up, optionally examining them, and placing them either on a bookshelf or on a table.

episodes.name: Heap to Shelf
episodes.description: The person picks a book from a heap, examines it, and places it on the bookshelf.

d19faa97-b823-4c1d-b00b-e9839f1a2391.overall_goal: Prepare and tune a guitar while referencing a book, then place the book on a stand for reading

episodes.name: Read and mark book
episodes.description: The person picks up and opens a book, flips through pages, marks it, and reads from it while holding it.
